thread.section_title: PACK & SEND Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PACK & SEND Australia | www.packsend.com.au
thread.title: Ben Milburn
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Ben Milburn

author: Ben Milburn
title: Ben Milburn
text: My package went missing for over a week without explanation. There is also no delivery date estimate on the website, it just says it will be sent within 1-2 days. I assumed that the package would arrive interstate within four days or so. Not the case. More than 2 weeks later it arrived after many phone calls trying to locate my package. The customer service person was as helpful as she could be, but couldn't tell me where my package was, or when it would arrive. I won't be using this service again.
